text: The Windy City Bluez were a W-League club based in Palos Hills, Illinois, USA. The team folded after the 2004 season. ==Year-by-year== {| class="wikitable" !Year !Division !League !Reg. Season !Playoffs |- |2003 |2 |USL W-League |5th, Midwest | |- |2004 |1 |USL W-League |6th, Midwest | |} Category:Women's soccer clubs in the United States Category:Soccer clubs in Chicago Category:Soccer clubs in Illinois Category:Defunct USL W-League teams Category:2004 disestablishments in Illinois Category:2003 establishments in Illinois Category:Association football clubs established in 2003 Category:Association football clubs disestablished in 2004
title: Windy City Bluez
